plot: Although his father forbids it, a young woman cannot live without seeing her mother who has been thrown out of the house and banned from having contact with the family.
title: Monyeo
plot_es: Although his father forbids it, a young woman cannot live without seeing her mother who has been thrown out of the house and banned from having contact with the family.
plot_en: Although his father forbids it, a young woman cannot live without seeing her mother who has been thrown out of the house and banned from having contact with the family.
